Campus Safety
Greek Life
Clubs and Activities
Great for these types of students
Share any unusual traditions or locations on campus
Bang for the buck
What to do for fun
Food and Dining
Dorm Life
Academic Rigor
Tips for prospective students
In three sentences
Comments
With our new Police Chief our campus has taken campus safety to a new level from Police SUV's to a fleet of new officers.
We have some of the best Divine Nine Organizations here on the YARD. From The Alphas to the AKA's.
There is a club for anyone on campus. All you have to do is look.
If you are always wanting something to do and always want to be involved with campus activities you should definitely join SGA.
The candlelight ceremony for the freshmen class is a tradition rich here at Alabama A&M University. It makes you feel as you are now apart of the University.
The bowling center in our Wellness Center is great. It is very inexpensive and some days its only a dollar.
There are a lot of intramural activities that you can take part on campus from horse-back riding to fishing to tournament football and basketball.
The food is ok, by the end of the year everything tends to be the same, but I am no one to complain food is food.
Dorm life is great. I recommend staying in a traditional dorm your freshmen year. You build bonds that last a life time.
The academia here at AAMU is not to hard, but it does prepare you for work life and graduate school.
Make sure you get involved with campus activities and organizations. Also make sure to network while you are here.
AAMU is a great institution where students come first. The teachers care about us and were not just a number. When I have kids my kids will attend this great University.
pageTitle: Alabama A & M University (AAMU) Reviews: Student Reviews and Ratings | Cappex
TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {14172=AAMU is not a very expensive school and every penny you pay to attend AAMU is worth it. There are lots of scholarships and grant opportunities available for students who attend or plan on attending AAMU. You just have to meet and talk to the right people. For example, any students who plan on having a career in the medical field can join this organization called HCOP and receive free MCAT,PCAT, and DCAT exams tutoring as well as a $2000 scholarship for the fall., 245767=There is the Block where all of the Greek stones are. There is the founding president and his wife's grave located on the campus. There is also the Magic City Classic, which is held in Birmingham, Alabama the fourth weekend in October against the rival school, Alabama State University. This is the biggest HBCU game of the season., 267558=© 2015, Cappex.com, LLC}

textAfterTable: Am learning a lot I would honestly say that I am learning a lot of new things at AAMU. I came here thinking that college was going to be extremely hard and that I would fail. But in reality I have had the best classes and very helpful teachers. This is my second semester here and I am very excited about my new classes. Login to rate or flag the reviews Christopher from Birmingham, AL 12/15/2009 Reviewer is A current student here. 11 out of 11 people found this review useful. 4 of 69 Categories Comments Great for these types of students I will be completely honest to everyone reading this review. If you are looking for an exciting college experience where you meet many people this school is not for you. If your going to college for the sole purpose of learning and improving yourself AAMU is for you. This is a historically black university so expect not to have the best of everything given to you. Its up to you
